title: Acid Splash
contents: text | You fire a small orb of acid that deals 1d3 acid damage. This acid disappears after 1 round.

title: Greatsword
contents: description | Attack | Roll 1d20 + STR. If the result is greater than or equal to the target's AC, you hit.
description | Critical Hits | If you rolled a natural 19-20 on your attack roll, it's a critical threat. Roll again. If you hit, the critical hit is confirmed.
description | Damage | Roll 2d6 + STR. If you made a critical hit, roll 1 more time and add the results together. The target takes this much damage.

title: Longbow
contents: description | Attack | Roll 1d20 + DEX. If the result is greater than or equal to the target's AC, you hit.
description | Critical Hits | If you rolled a natural 20 on your attack roll, it's a critical threat. Roll again. If you hit, the critical hit is confirmed.
description | Damage | Roll 1d8. If you made a critical hit, roll 2 more times and add the results together. The target takes this much damage.

title: Crossbow Bolts (10)
contents: property | Usage | heavy crossbows, light crossbows, hand crossbows
description | Heavy Crossbows | Crossbow bolts are the standard ammunition for heavy crossbows.
description | Light Crossbows | Crossbow bolts are the standard ammunition for light crossbows.
description | Hand Crossbows | Crossbow bolts are the standard ammunition for hand crossbows.
